title: include/exclude filters by tag
description: When specifying a filter list in JSON syntax, it would be nice to be able to include/exclude filters by tag.

comments.author: Pablo Anzorena
comments.content: Yonik Seeley is there any plan to add more like visualize filters? I mean, for example you ask for top 5 on field1, but you also want to see how does behave some other values for that field (in terms of stat and why not the position in the ranking).

comments.author: Mikhail Khludnev
comments.content: Isn't it done already, Yonik Seeley?
